description.en: XRP Apes the all-encompassing crypto ecosystem that brings swap, XRP rewards, AND anti-whale mechanisms. XRP Apes is part of the next evolution of yield-generating contracts on the BSC ecosystem. You get rewarded in XRP instead of native XRPAPE tokens . XRP Apes uses a unique system that auto-claims for every single holder the amount due. XRP APES PROTOCOL offers the highest XRP rewards compared to other XRP reflection tokens! Safely ape in, get rewarded with 7% XRP!
